channel.title: Comments on: The ‘Prebuilt Hackintosh of 2013’ in 2020

item.title: By: Nam Vũ
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2019/11/the-prebuilt-hackintosh-of-2013-in-202/#comment-5871">Rodolfo Domingues</a>.
I tried again today using the vanilla method but removing the RX 580 (using only the integrated graphic) and managed to get Catalina running smoothly on it. However I still have a few things I need to sort out before updating the post (WiFi, Audio, Bluetooth, reinstalling the RX580 etc.)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Rodolfo Domingues.

I tried again today using the vanilla method but removing the RX 580 (using only the integrated graphic) and managed to get Catalina running smoothly on it. However I still have a few things I need to sort out before updating the post (WiFi, Audio, Bluetooth, reinstalling the RX580 etc.)

item.title: By: Rodolfo Domingues
item.dc:creator: Rodolfo Domingues
item.description: I'm trying the same thing. I'm not even get the UniBeast USB UFI to work.
item.content:encoded: I’m trying the same thing. I’m not even get the UniBeast USB UFI to work.
